definition: exterior surface/family relationship via females/to show (one's opinion)/a model/a table (listing information)/a form/a meter (measuring sth)
Italy/Italian/abbr. for 意大利[Yi4 da4 li4]

pinyin: Zhong1 Ri4 Han2 tong3 yi1 biao3 yi4 wen2 zi4

sentences.english: Do not give opinions or advice unless you are asked.
sentences.chinese: 除非你是被询问者否则不要发表意见。

sentences.english: Students, he noted, are skilled at opining about books they have not read.
sentences.chinese: 他指出，学生擅长对他们没看过的书发表意见。

sentences.english: For CJK Unified Ideographs blocks, browse by radical.
sentences.chinese: 对于中日韩统一表意文字块，浏览激进。

sentences.english: Chinese and other ideographic characters will occupy two column positions. The wcwidth() function is used to test the display-width of each character
sentences.chinese: 中文和其它表意符号将占用两列位置。

sentences.english: Mr Santilli was the only one to have comment on his work.
sentences.chinese: 桑蒂利先生是唯一对他的工作发表意见的人。

sentences.english: The ideographic abstractness brings about the illusionary artistic world in novels.
sentences.chinese: 表意的抽象性导致小说艺术世界的虚幻化。

sentences.english: The judge deliveres himself of the view that young people were treated far too leniently.
sentences.chinese: 法官发表意见说，那个年轻人受到的处理过于宽大。

sentences.english: Bank of America and Mastercard have refused to comment to the BBC.
sentences.chinese: 美国银行和万事达拒绝在BBC上就此事发表意见。

sentences.english: Peep through the letterbox and see if anyone is at home.
sentences.chinese: 琼发表意见说，我们该回家了。

sentences.english: Chinese characters are an ideograph different from the alphabetic writing.
sentences.chinese: 汉字是一种与拼音文字不同的表意文字。

sentences.english: The expertise report should be cross-examined by both parties and advice should be given.
sentences.chinese: 鉴定意见书应当经双方当事人质证，发表意见。

sentences.english: Anyone can express his opinion in the confer-ence.
sentences.chinese: 任何人都可以在会议上发表意见。

sentences.english: The common belief is that the logo or the ideogram is the image embodying an organization.
sentences.chinese: 共同的信念是，标志或表意的形象体现，是一个组织。

sentences.english: Many candidates of the New Territories, one after another, stood up and expressed their opinions.
sentences.chinese: 不少新界的候选人一个接一个地站起来发表意见。

sentences.english: "The world's scientists have spoken clearly, and with one voice," he said.
sentences.chinese: “全世界的科学家已明确发表意见，异口同声”他说。

sentences.english: She know a lot of French word but pronounce them incorrectly.
sentences.chinese: 他太喜欢对自己实际上几乎一无所知的问题发表意见。

definition: to express or convey one's ideas
language component/morpheme/individual characters (making up an expression)
style of writing (literary style)/way of writing a character/spelling
